author: @Maison1990
text: I really never get these kinds of problems. Like, just spend a day or two copying, cleaning, and getting everything done. One guy could easily get this done in a day, two days if it needs to be cleaned.   And then make the dashboard in like, an hour.   I always feel like we have the simplest problems, but they're just technically exhaustive. But, still relatively simple.

author: @business_and_data
text: It must be taken into account that if you want to analyze data it can be at various levels, however, if you want to analyze data at a large level, these are normally generated in mature companies, so if you are looking to analyze data in a company that possibly has time of its conception but its processes have never matured, it is likely that you will end up analyzing a spaghetti of data that does not lead you to anything
